price: (2) It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.
arabic: يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yahdī ilā al-rush'di faāmannā bihi walan nush'rika birabbinā aḥadan
